data.name: Fairy Tail - Rella
data.desc: Neither player can target monsters on the field with Spell Cards or effects, except this one. Once per turn: You can discard 1 Spell; equip 1 Equip Spell from your hand, Deck, or GY to this card, but return that Equip Spell to the hand during the End Phase.

data.name: Massivemorph
data.desc: Target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; its ATK and DEF become double its current ATK and DEF, but it cannot attack directly.

data.name: Metrognome
data.desc:
[ Pendulum Effect ]
Once per turn: You can target 1 other card in a Pendulum Zone; this card's Pendulum Scale becomes equal to that card's, until the end of this turn.
----------------------------------------
[ Monster Effect ]
While you have 2 cards in your Pendulum Zones with the same Pendulum Scale, this card gains ATK and DEF equal to the Pendulum Scale x 100, and can attack your opponent directly. If this card inflicts battle damage to your opponent by a direct attack: Destroy all cards in the Pendulum Zones.

data.name: Terminal World NEXT
data.desc: Activate this card if your opponent controls 3 or fewer monsters and 3 or fewer Spell/Trap Cards, while you control no other cards. Cards cannot be placed on the field if it would give any player more than 3 monsters or more than 3 Spell/Trap Cards on their field.
